rows.label: soul05_P0101
rows.name:
Follow my lead!
Melee should do nicely.

rows.label: soul05_P0102
rows.name:
Mind staggering them with
some melee strikes?

rows.label: soul05_P0103
rows.name:
Let's make this memorable!
Give them a thumping!

rows.label: soul05_P0201
rows.name:
Ranged attacks are
where it's at.

rows.label: soul05_P0202
rows.name:
Can I ask for some extra
power?

rows.label: soul05_P0203
rows.name:
Weakening foes is the bread
and butter of warfare.

rows.label: soul05_P0301
rows.name:
Would you do as I do and
really go in swinging?

rows.label: soul05_P0302
rows.name:
Supporting fire, please!
If you'd be so kind.

rows.label: soul05_P0303
rows.name:
An aura would be rather
splendid, actually.

rows.label: soul05_P0401
rows.name:
I'm struggling a bit. Could
someone patch me up?

rows.label: soul05_P0402
rows.name:
I'd really welcome a spot of
support.

rows.label: soul05_P0403
rows.name:
I'm lacking in momentum.
Can someone strengthen me?

rows.label: soul05_P0501
rows.name:
Sorry, I'm at my limit...
Heal me, before it's too late...

rows.label: soul05_P0502
rows.name:
Is this the end for me...?
Yes, unless I get healed...

rows.label: soul05_P0503
rows.name:
It's life or death...
Empower me, while you can!

rows.label: soul05_P0601
rows.name:
Use melee attacks...
Let it be my legacy...

rows.label: soul05_P0602
rows.name:
Don't mind me at all...
Just fire with all you have.

rows.label: soul05_P0603
rows.name:
It's time for an aura...
You'll go on without me...

rows.label: soul05_P0701
rows.name:
Hit them from up close.
Make sure they feel it.

rows.label: soul05_P0702
rows.name:
Go on, shoot now.
The odds favor you.

rows.label: soul05_P0703
rows.name:
Weaken the enemyâ€”there
won't be a better chance!

rows.label: soul05_P0801
rows.name:
You've got my blessing to
engage in melee.

rows.label: soul05_P0802
rows.name:
Now to topple them.
A ranged shot should do it.

rows.label: soul05_P0803
rows.name:
If you were planning to use
a debuff, now's your chance.

rows.label: soul05_P0901
rows.name:
They'll make a nice target.
Fire at will!

rows.label: soul05_P0902
rows.name:
Preparation will be key.
Use a strengthening move!

rows.label: soul05_P0903
rows.name:
Let's see... Overdrive would
make short work of them.

rows.label: soul05_P1001
rows.name:
I've done my part, yes?
I'll leave the melee to you.

rows.label: soul05_P1002
rows.name:
We're in a good position!
Keep up the support fire!

rows.label: soul05_P1003
rows.name:
The time has come. Give
them a taste of weakness.

rows.label: soul05_P1101
rows.name:
All right, let's use an aura to
really make our point.

rows.label: soul05_P1102
rows.name:
Take a deep breath...
Then we'll go with an aura.

rows.label: soul05_P1103
rows.name:
Don't panic, just use a buff.
Preparation is everything.

rows.label: soul05_P1201
rows.name:
We've been waiting for this.
Activate Overdrive!

rows.label: soul05_P1202
rows.name:
Let our Overdrives rise in
a deafening chorus!

rows.label: soul05_P1203
rows.name:
What would you say to a
symphony of auras?

rows.label: soul05_C0101
rows.name:
Let's clear out the others.
Press on with melee strikes.

rows.label: soul05_C0102
rows.name:
Such is always the way...
But don't stop shooting!

rows.label: soul05_C0103
rows.name:
It's not quite over yet.
I'd appreciate your support.

rows.label: soul05_C0201
rows.name:
Who might you be aiming at?
Now, time to deploy an aura.

rows.label: soul05_C0202
rows.name:
This is how you dodge.
Now, strengthen me, please.

rows.label: soul05_C0203
rows.name:
I'll draw them in,
you shoot 'em out.

rows.label: soul05_C0301
rows.name:
Now that's what I call
immediate results.

rows.label: soul05_C0302
rows.name:
Empty your clips at them.
That will bring us victory.

rows.label: soul05_C0303
rows.name:
Don't think too hard, just go
with the flow and close in.

rows.label: soul05_C0401
rows.name:
We must make ourselves
stronger. It's the only way.

rows.label: soul05_C0402
rows.name:
Easy does it. Ready yourself
with an aura.

rows.label: soul05_C0403
rows.name:
It might be our chance.
Enfeeble the enemy!

rows.label: soul05_C0501
rows.name:
Enhance our performance!
If not now, when?

rows.label: soul05_C0502
rows.name:
Shall I act the decoy? Use
the gap to strengthen us!

rows.label: soul05_C0503
rows.name:
They're distracted...
Quick, activate Overdrive.

rows.label: soul05_C0601
rows.name:
Don't worry about me, just
pound the enemy into dust!

rows.label: soul05_C0602
rows.name:
Thank you...
Oh, is it time to shoot again?

rows.label: soul05_C0603
rows.name:
Seeing you use an aura
would greatly lift my spirits.

rows.label: soul05_C0701
rows.name:
Are you quite all right?
You ought to gather strength.

rows.label: soul05_C0702
rows.name:
Thank you very much... Now
give yourself a boost, too.

rows.label: soul05_C0703
rows.name:
How very sweet you are...
Please, use an aura next.

rows.label: soul05_C0801
rows.name:
I don't relish brute force, but
now is just the time for it.

rows.label: soul05_C0802
rows.name:
We can't let it end here.
Support me with all your fire!

rows.label: soul05_C0803
rows.name:
Having a buff for support
would be most appreciated.

rows.label: soul05_C0901
rows.name:
I'll take 'em from this side.
You match me, shot for shot.

rows.label: soul05_C0902
rows.name:
A grand view. Lay into them
with all the guns we have!

rows.label: soul05_C0903
rows.name:
Ranged attacks would not go
amiss, in my humble opinion.

rows.label: soul05_C1001
rows.name:
With a heavy heart I say:
smack them silly!

rows.label: soul05_C1002
rows.name:
Poor soul. They're just
begging to get shot at.

rows.label: soul05_C1003
rows.name:
Oh dear... This behavior will
see you weakened, sadly.

rows.label: soul05_C1101
rows.name:
Now, lash out at them as
you see fit.

rows.label: soul05_C1102
rows.name:
I think that should make it
easier to shoot them, no?

rows.label: soul05_C1103
rows.name:
Weaken them more!
Uncouth, but it needs doing.

rows.label: soul05_C1201
rows.name:
Sleeping, here? Don't make
us slap you awake, now.

rows.label: soul05_C1202
rows.name:
You get a bullet! You get one!
Bullets for everybody!

rows.label: soul05_C1203
rows.name:
Playing possum, are they?
C'mon, give them a poke!

rows.label: soul05_C1301
rows.name:
I'll seize them here. Everyone
else, go on the offensive!

rows.label: soul05_C1302
rows.name:
Fire at will! ...Just don't
hit me by accident.

rows.label: soul05_C1303
rows.name:
Right! Could you help me
keep them pinned down?

rows.label: soul05_C1401
rows.name:
My Skell's acting up.
Might be time for repairs.

rows.label: soul05_C1402
rows.name:
Unacceptable... Give them
a good wallop, will you?

rows.label: soul05_C1403
rows.name:
What a bother...
How about some cover fire?

rows.label: soul05_C1501
rows.name:
Well, that's totaled...
Could I get some healing?

rows.label: soul05_C1502
rows.name:
You protected me...
Now strengthen me, too.

rows.label: soul05_C1503
rows.name:
I will not waste this chance...
Let's hit back with Overdrive!

rows.label: soul05_C1601
rows.name:
...Fuel running low?
Can I ask for some support?

rows.label: soul05_C1602
rows.name:
Skell's a little tuckered out.
Can you patch it up?

rows.label: soul05_C1603
rows.name:
I'll need replenishing,
or I might not make it...
